name: Calixtinus
description:
Calixtinus is an RPG based on the Saint James's Way.

It is the adventure of 3 pilgrims who must reach Compostela and fulfill the objectives of an important mission.

To do this they must complete the entire way defeating all the enemies and collecting special items.

We have released a first demo of the game with the first 7 (of 77) levels. The Calixtinus demo is alive, we will be incorporating new levels once they are developed. We will update this page every time this happens.

*** Update Aug 23 ***

We have released the second demo of the game with two more new (9 of 77) levels.
